extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the system is affected by checking the installed version of QTS, QuTS hero, QuTScloud, Multimedia Console, or Media Streaming add-on.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updates for CVE-2023-23368
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest updates for QTS 5.0.x, QTS 4.5.x, QuTS hero h5.0.x, QuTS hero h4.5.x, and QuTScloud c5.0.x as per QNAP product support status.

extracted_playbook.title: Install Updates for CVE-2023-23369
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest updates for QTS 5.1.x, QTS 4.3.6, QTS 4.3.4, QTS 4.3.3, QTS 4.2.x, Multimedia Console 2.1.x, Multimedia Console 1.4.x, Media Streaming add-on 500.1.x, and Media Streaming add-on 500.0.x as per QNAP product support status.
